item.title: Software Project
item.description: Welcome to my blog with some of my work in progress. I’ve been working on this book idea. You can read some of the chapters below.

item.title: STUDENT CLUSTER COMPETITION
item.description: National Tsing Hua University Student Cluster Competition Team - 2020 APAC HPC-AI Competition Contestant Singapore Oct 2020 * High Performance and Artificial Intelligence supercomputers Competition. * Co-organized by the HPC-AI Advisory Council and the Singapore National Supercomputing Center. * Accelerate the ocean science model NEMO ( Nucleus for European Modelling of the Ocean ) from single node ( 24 cpus per node ) to 32 nodes ( 15 CPUs per node ).
